Reason: The configuration option 'hinted_handoff_throttle_in_kb' is performance-sensitive. The reason for this classification is that the 'hinted_handoff_throttle_in_kb' configuration directly affects the rate at which hints are dispatched to other nodes in the cluster. The code related to this configuration involves creating a RateLimiter based on the value of 'hinted_handoff_throttle_in_kb', which controls the rate of dispatching hints. This rate limitation directly impacts the performance of the system by controlling the flow of hints traffic, ensuring that the system does not overload with hint dispatch operations. Therefore, any changes to the 'hinted_handoff_throttle_in_kb' configuration can have a notable performance impact at the system level.
